links.title: Tesla: The Bears Make Their Case
links.description: Tesla's ( TSLA) been on the receiving end of some good-- and bad--analyst reports recently, but value investors are getting sick to their stomach. Yesterday, I spoke with John Thompson, chief investment officer at hedge-fund Vilas Capital Management, about Tesla and he explained why he was now short the stock.

links.title: Why this expert is short Tesla's stock
links.description: John Thompson, CEO & CIO at Vilas Capital, says Tesla shares are "extremely overvalued" considering how the carmaker is losing money on the back of impact from cheaper gasoline.

links.title: Patrick Soon-Shiong on 'holy grail' zinc-air battery
